data.name: Fishing Planet - Sport Feeder Pack
data.detailed_description:
Sport Feeder Pack is a powerful set of all the sports edition tackle every angler needs for the ultimate feeder fishing experience! You get the awesome combo of the Big Alli Sport feeder rod and BigRiver Sport feeder reel, a complete selection of all the terminal tackle, feeder baits, chum, attractants and a Keepnet. Sport Feeder Pack is a compact and all-inclusive tackle set to enjoy your feeder fishing on the level of sports!

Sport Feeder Pack includes:
* 20 BAITCOINS use to purchase advanced fishing tackle, available only for BaitCoins. Spend your BaitCoins wisely!
* 30 Storage Slots
* 1 Tackle Setup Slot
* 5 Recipe Slots

SPORTY RODS ‘N REELS
Rod:
* UL-CHUBER Big Alli 420 Sport - Length: 13' 10" (4.2 m); Casting Weight: 3 – 6 1/5 Oz. (85–175 g); Power: X Heavy; Line Weight: 6.5–18.5 Lb. (3–8.5 kg); Action: Fast; Pieces: 3+3; Guides: 12+6; Quiver Tips: 3 Oz., 4 Oz., 5 Oz.
Reel:
* UL-CHUBER Big River 6000 Sport - Ratio: 6.0:1; Recovery: 47" (120 cm); Capacity: mono 32/120 (0.5/120), braid 30/205 (0.28/205); Max Drag: 18 Lb (8.15 kg).; Ball Bearings: 7+1; Weight (Oz.): 19 (545 g); Drag: front

TERMINAL TACKLE
Lines:
* Braid .0085" (0.22 mm) - Length: 1000 yd (1000 m); Test: 17 Lb. (7.7 kg)
* Mono Leaders - Length: 2 yd (2 m):
0.16 (0.006") - Test: 7 lb (3.15 kg)
0.2 (0.008") - Test: 9.7 lb (4.4 kg)
0.25 (0.010") - Test: 14.3 lb (6.5 kg)
* Hooks: #16; #12; #6; #2; #1
* Open Feeders: 115 g
* Closed Feeders: 80 g; 140 g
* Baits: Caster Maggots; Yellow Maggots; Red Maggots; Centipedes; Bloodworms; Pinkies
* Groundbaits: Crimson Cold Water Golden; Universal Mixture Golden; Big Riverine Breamer Golden; Black Roacher Golden
* Aromas: Spicy Worms Golden; Molasses Caramelized Golden; BigBream Spicy Golden

EQUIPMENT
* GarryScott™ FishCabin XS Plus Keepnet - Max Single Fish Weight: 33 Lb. (15 kg); Total Fish Weight: 66 Lb. (30 kg); Fish-Friendly: yes

data.short_description: Sport Feeder Pack is a powerful set of all the sports edition tackle every angler needs for the ultimate feeder fishing experience! You get the awesome combo of the Big Alli Sport feeder rod and BigRiver Sport feeder reel, a complete selection of all the terminal tackle, feeder baits, chum, attractants and a Keepnet.
data.supported_languages: English, French, German, Polish, Russian, Ukrainian, Spanish - Spain, Dutch, Portuguese - Brazil, Simplified Chinese, Italian, Traditional Chinese

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: OS Version - Windows 7, 8, 10 x64
  • Processor: Dual-Core 2.4 Ghz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Graphics Card Intel HD4600 or higher
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 12 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: External mouse or compatible Xbox controller required
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7,8,10 x64, Mac OS X
  • Processor: Quad-Core 3.0 GHz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Graphics Card with 2 GB Video RAM: Nvidia Geforce GTX 660 or equivalent
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 12 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: External mouse or compatible Xbox controller required

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:

  • OS: 10.9 Mavericks
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 1,6 Ghz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD Graphics 6000
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 12 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: External mouse or compatible Xbox controller required
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: 10.11 El Capitan
  • Processor: Intel Quad-Core 2.2 GHz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD Radeon R9 M370X 2 GB GDDR5
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 12 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: External mouse or compatible Xbox controller required

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Ubuntu 12.04
  • Processor: Dual core from Intel or AMD at 2.8 GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: nVidia Geforce 8600/9600GT (Driver v331), AMD HD 2xxx-4xxx (Driver mesa 10.5.9), AMD HD 5xxx+ (Driver mesa 10.5.9 or Catalyst 15.7), Intel HD 3000 (Driver mesa 10.6)
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 12 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: External mouse or compatible Xbox controller required
